definitions.definition: A one - dimensional object comprising one vertex and one (not necessarily straight ) edge both of whose ends are that vertex.
A two -dimensional object comprising one vertex, one edge both of whose ends are that vertex, and one face filling in the hollow formed by that edge.

main_definition: ( geometry ) A one - dimensional object comprising one vertex and one (not necessarily straight ) edge both of whose ends are that vertex.
secondary_definitions: ( geometry ) A two -dimensional object comprising one vertex, one edge both of whose ends are that vertex, and one face filling in the hollow formed by that edge.
